pageContext.claim: “I mean, whether you look at median income, whether you look at employment or unemployment, no matter what chart you're looking at [it's the best ever]. It's either ever or 50 or 60 years.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Census Bureau data shows that 2017 median household income was the highest on record, but the Census Bureau says the number may be misleading. The income questions for the Current Population Survey were redesigned and when adjusted for the change, median household income in previous years was just as high.
